title: Can't open the game?
body: Whenever i click on the launcher it pops up with the logo for a few seconds and then disappears and nothing happens is there a fix?

replies.body:
>#Launcher closes without warning / does not open when clicked
* Try running as an admin by right clicking on the icon and selecting "Run As" and "Administrator"
* Make sure your [Internet Security Settings](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202536660-Issues-with-the-League-of-Legends-Store-PvP-Net-#jwq2) are set properly.
* If you recently did a system restore, had a virus or did a Windows reinstall, you may want to try [Reinstalling League of Legends](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends).
* Run through the RADS Fix in [this video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HHcfG9RV9Rw)
* Try changing your screen resolution to 1024x768 [(Windows)](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#jwq1) [(Mac)](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#jmq1)

https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/LbPY3Rpr-experiencing-a-tech-problem-find-the-common-fixes-here#launcher
